summary: Katana Inu - Katana Inu is a crypto based (NFT) PC game with high quality graphics and limited NFTs. It is a third-person game that focuses on fast-paced sword and spell fighting. The goal is to attract web2 gamers to come over to web3 for the mass adoption and compete with big, well known games. The focus is Fun2Play and Play-To-Earn/Own. Katana Inu is not a Pay2Win game. All Skins and Spells are cosmetics. Having rankings, collecting rare NFTs, participating in tournaments and playing in eSports leagues.
